recipes.soundhalo_clients::handle_loadbalancers_: Runs remote recipe on app server from loadbalancer requesting access. DO NOT RUN.
recipes.soundhalo_clients::setup_vhosts: Loops [:app] collection and creates a vhost entry for each one
recipes.soundhalo_clients::install_php: Installs the required php libraries for the blog
recipes.soundhalo_clients::install_nodeJS: What is says on the tin
recipes.soundhalo_clients::request_loadbalancer_: Sends a request to all application servers tagged with loadbalancer:app=<applistener_name> to deny connections from the server's private IP address. This script should be run on a load balancer after disconnecting application servers or upon decommissioning.
recipes.soundhalo_clients::do_loadbalancers_deny: Denies connections from all load balancers which are tagged with loadbalancer:lb=<applistener_name>. For example, you can run this script on an application server to deny connections from all load balancers within a given listener pool.
recipes.soundhalo_clients::do_loadbalancers_allo: Allows connections from all load balancers within a given listener pool which are tagged with loadbalancer:lb=<applistener_name>. This script should be run on an application server before it makes a request to be connected to the load balancers.
recipes.soundhalo_clients::update_code_mobile: checkout or pull down code for mobile app. runs build script and restarts apache
recipes.soundhalo_clients::update_code_desktop: checkout or pull down code for desktop app. runs build script and restarts apache
recipes.soundhalo_clients::request_loadbalancer_: Sends a request to all application servers tagged with loadbalancer:app=<applistener_name> to allow connections from the server's private IP address. This script should be run on a load balancer before any application servers are attached to it.
recipes.soundhalo_clients::handle_loadbalancers_: Runs remote recipe on app server from loadbalancer revoking access. DO NOT RUN.
